title.value: The State of Data Curation at NeurIPS: An Assessment of Dataset Development Practices in the Datasets and Benchmarks Track
title.justification: The title 'The State of Data Curation at NeurIPS: An Assessment of Dataset Development Practices in the Datasets and Benchmarks Track' encapsulates the focus of the paper on evaluating dataset development practices at NeurIPS through the lens of data curation.
title.quote: This work provides an analysis of recent dataset development practices at NeurIPS through the lens of data curation.

extractions.description: This paper evaluates dataset development practices at NeurIPS, focusing on data curation principles. It presents an evaluation framework for dataset documentation to improve dataset quality, reusability, and accountability. The study systematically assesses 60 datasets published at NeurIPS from 2021-2023, identifying areas needing improvement such as environmental footprint and ethical considerations.

type.justification: The paper conducts a systematic evaluation of 60 datasets, applying a framework to assess current practices. This direct analysis and examination of actual examples denote empirical research.
type.quote: We use the framework to systematically assess the strengths and weaknesses in current dataset development practices of 60 datasets published in the NeurIPS Datasets and Benchmarks track from 2021-2023.

name.justification: The paper focuses on dataset development within the field of Machine Learning, specifically related to datasets and benchmarks used in ML applications.
name.quote: The field of machine learning is increasingly observing the importance of data curation to the advancement of both applications and fundamental understanding of machine learning models.

name.justification: The paper's primary focus is on evaluating dataset practices through the lens of data curation, translating these concepts for ML datasets.
name.quote: We present a systematic dataset documentation evaluation framework to organize the assessment of curation practices for ML dataset development.

name.justification: Data management is central to the discussion of effective curation and maintaining dataset integrity, authenticity, and reusability.
name.quote: We summarize key findings and trends. Results indicate greater need for documentation about environmental footprint, ethical considerations, and data management.

name.justification: LoveDA is referenced as part of the datasets assessed in the NeurIPS evaluation framework study.
name.quote: LoveDA: A Remote Sensing Land-Cover Dataset for Domain Adaptive Semantic Segmentation.
